question1.a: Not if there's an engineer and designer at the helm. AI is a tool - like a brush for a painter. In my hands, it generates proposals, but every project goes through human curation and refinement.

question2.a: Less than you think. Because AI saves us time, and you money. Single room from $900, 2-3 room apartment from $1,800. Zero hidden costs.

aboutHome.heading: Designing the future.
aboutHome.paragraph1: I'm an interior designer and graphic artist with an architectural background. I combine technical engineering knowledge with graphic and artistic skills, using advanced AI-powered tools.
aboutHome.paragraph2: A unique combination of three competencies - engineering approach, artistic talent, and AI technology. This allows me to create functional, aesthetic solutions faster and at attractive prices.
aboutHome.paragraph3: I specialize in projects for - bold first-time apartment buyers who appreciate colorful arrangements, remote work spaces, and smart home solutions, instead of subdued beige and gray interiors.
aboutHome.quote: The combination of technical knowledge, creativity, and AI creates a new quality of design.

hero.label: About me
hero.name: Magda
hero.title: Interior & Graphic Designer
hero.description: I combine architectural knowledge with artistic creativity and cutting-edge AI technologies, creating functional spaces and unique visual identities.

experience.heading: Experience
experience.paragraph1: I am an interior and graphic designer with years of experience in the creative industry. My approach combines solid architectural foundations with modern technologies and a deep understanding of client needs.
experience.paragraph2: I specialize in designing residential and commercial spaces, creating functional and aesthetic solutions. My graphic work includes comprehensive visual identities, advertising materials, and specialized projects.
experience.skills: AutoCAD, SketchUp, Adobe Creative Suite, 3ds Max, V-Ray, Lumion. Experience in BIM, sustainable design, and AI technology supporting the creative process.

architecture.title: Architectural Design
architecture.description: Comprehensive architectural projects from concept to execution documentation. Experience in residential, commercial, and public projects.

graphics.title: Computer Graphics
graphics.description: Visual identities, advertising materials, illustrations, and specialized projects. Over 50 completed branding projects.

ai.title: AI Technology
ai.description: Using artificial intelligence to accelerate design processes and generate innovative solutions. Optimization of costs and project timelines.

philosophy.heading: Design

functionality.title: Functionality first
functionality.description: Beauty without functionality is just decoration. Every project must first and foremost work for its users - be comfortable, practical, and safe.

personality.title: Space personality
personality.description: Every space should reflect the character of its owner. I create places that tell a story and express individuality.

innovation.title: Technological innovation
innovation.description: I use the latest technologies, including AI, to accelerate design processes and achieve better results in less time.

partnership.title: Client partnership
partnership.description: A project is a shared journey. I listen, advise, and together we create a solution perfectly tailored to the client's needs and dreams.

philosophy.quote: Good design is not just beautiful forms, but above all solutions to problems.

cta.heading: Let's start
cta.description: Have a project idea? Want to create a unique space or refresh your visual identity? Contact me - together we'll create something amazing.
